text: [ This story contains spoilers from the series finale of ABC's Scandal, ` ` Over a Cliff.'' ] The Gladiators have left their arena. On Thursday, ABC and Shonda Rhimes closed up Olivia Pope and Associates for good as Scandal wrapped its seven - season run with a series finale that explored the ramifications of going public with the existence of black - ops group B613 and the ultimate corruption that comes with the thirst for power and the Oval Office.
